categories: Category:Military personnel of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Marko Ka was a male soldier of the reconstituted Sith Empire living during the Galactic War. At some point he became part of the Order of Revan and defected from the Empire, joining with the Revanite forces on Rishi. During the Battle of Rishi in 3637 BBY he and a fellow Revanite Rarrook tried to stop a strike team from reaching the signal jammer on the Razorback Island, but failed and were killed.
Marko Ka appears in the Star Wars: The Old Republic: Shadow of Revan expansion, released on December 2, 2014.
